data.text: Today we celebrate #JerusalemDay, commemorating the reunification of #Jerusalem #Israel 46 years ago!
Check out this wonderful time-lapse video of #TelAviv's most classic symbols! http://t.co/em5KFWSsw0 #Israel
@fundraisinisfun :)
@MrStormLee Hope to see you again soon!
RT @MrStormLee: @ELALUSA Thank you for an amazing trip and treating me so well. I Cant wait to go back. #lifechanging
#ShabbatShalom #GoodShabbos, we hope you have a wonderful weekeend! http://t.co/YDfN6hvxey
A year ago, we started our #ELAL #photoblog & fans have already uploaded over 1k photos! http://t.co/znUxYqUrWH
Check out this beautiful Point-of-View video that shows #Israel from a whole new perspective! http://t.co/ixYlgrTTHO
@nathanpez if you DM us a few specifics, we can also try to have someone reach out via email. Thanks for your patience!
RT @alywalansky: The best hummus I've ever eaten is in the @ElAlUSA lounge. This bodes well!
@nathanpez Hi Nate, may be more effective to send an email to customerrelations@elalusa.com
62 years ago today, #ELAL made its first flight ever to New York! #travel #history #NYC #Israel http://t.co/ACXfo6fA3W
We wish you a great weekend and #ShabbatShalom! http://t.co/xMazOpnn3j
Did you know that #ELAL passengers can bid for an upgrade after you book a ticket? Check out this @WSJ article: http://t.co/eoXDLHRIYf
Leadership & board members of @USTOA are touring #Israel so they can promote the history & beauty of the country! http://t.co/ekzaNBTA3o
Wishing @GovernorOMalley of Maryland a wonderful trip! http://t.co/MTCyqaduTg
#ELAL passengers who experienced a flight cancellation should contact their travel agent or the EL AL Reservations Center at 800-223-6700
Flights operating tonight from Israel to USA operating as scheduled. As of tomorrow, flights from USA to Israel will operate as scheduled
The General Federation of Labor in Israel has announced that the strike is over: http://t.co/glawpmAVjb
EL AL ISRAEL AIRLINES RESPONDS TO OPEN SKIES POLICY: http://t.co/KbYZqcb7G5
For updates on flights: https://t.co/ZwQf3VnEi9
@TShadyIsrael @BarbraStreisand It will be a truly incredible experience :)
@TheMaelMan We are too!
@jacobbgross Looking forward to it!
#ShabbatShalom from #ELAL, have a great weekend! #GoodShabbos #Shabbat #Israel http://t.co/aXJTpzz8BE
@netsociology We look forward to having you!
@aubreychapnick We hope so :)
You can still see @BarbraStreisand in #Israel for the very first time! http://t.co/mFMKb7ow0O #music #concert
The 52nd #Israel Festival will take place 5/23 to 6/22, learn more at http://t.co/MAu5HFOT9P
Our thoughts and prayers go out to #Boston, MA, the victims and their families.
EL AL wishes #Israel and all of its citizens and supporters a Happy 65th Independence Day! http://t.co/jCTvv49dCd
On Yom Hazikaron, Israel's Memorial Day, we pay our respects to the fallen Israeli soldiers and victims of terrorism.
#ShabbatShalom #GoodShabbos we hope you have a wonderful weekend! #Israel #sunset http://t.co/Hq8niqWnB5
@Sharon_Wagner We never received a DM from you. Please send your email address if you would like someone to get back to you.
@Sharon_Wagner Hi Sharon, sorry to hear about your trouble. Would you mind sending us a DM with your email address so someone can reach out?
Who wishes they were landing in #Israel right now? http://t.co/WtKfoUpBWM
@Samperzan We can't wait to fly you to #Israel and start such an incredible journey with you :)
@JackGrifo We agree!
@eliiiiiiiiw you make us pretty happy as well :)
@AJEinbinder We can't wait to fly you there!
RT @SIXTIsrael: ‏@ELALUSA The National Tour Association named #Israel the top Faith Destination of the year!  http://t.co/ZKolSLgzS9
Don't miss @IsraelFilmCtr at @JCCManhattan 4/11-18 w/ new Israeli Films! Use #ELAL code for special rate: ifcfpal http://t.co/V2apo9H2eA
@RabbiShaul Same here!
@Jfryd015 We are so glad to hear it and can't wait!
RT @MaitalSabban: I just landed in @Israel .. I'm so happy to be here:-) Thank you @ELALUSA for another wonderful flight!
Nothing like #spring in #Israel! Have you been lucky enough to experience it? http://t.co/iEJyGzr1Z9
@AmyRBromberg @anniefitz Thanks for the kind words! Hope to see you soon :)
@MaitalSabban @Israel So glad to hear it, have a wonderful trip!
EL AL remembers the victims of the Holocaust. http://t.co/r3dct2mnjO
Almost home... #ShabbatShalom #GoodShabbos & have a wonderful #weekend! http://t.co/pstP89VnwR
When the city that never sleeps meets best places to sleep in the city, nothing like boutique hotels in #TelAviv! http://t.co/y0H0XLI9dk
@DrMikeCohen Hi Mike, please DM us your email address so that we may address your concerns. We apologize for any inconvenience!
#ELAL one of the Best Airlines for Family #Travel http://t.co/9G55WjuaIC @POPSUGARMoms
#Jerusalem #Israel in 60 seconds! Fasten your seat belt and try not to blink! http://t.co/mG2eQybEJO
@danielhalevy Not at the moment, but you never know :)
@TaraLeighCobble Hi Tara, yes! Feel free to like us on Facebook to stay up to date with any promotions going on! http://t.co/sLITH1BunG
#ISRAEL - Small but Outstanding. RT if you agree that there is no other place like it in the world! http://t.co/9duiV1TfAv
@zatrain Thank you, Zach!
@jenn_milla34 Counting down the minutes :)
@JBHORSLEY Thank you for the kind words, John! Hope to see you soon!
@GrantBigman We hope so!
@wigbone Thanks for the kind words, Steve! We're glad you had a nice flight and hope you have a wonderful trip!
RT @wigbone: Happiness is: Direct flight from LAX to Tel Aviv on @ELALUSA !! They did me right and they'll do you right, too!!
#DidYouKnow: #ELAL has kids meals & fares, plus a variety of in-flight activities including a clown who performs on some day flights!
Today is the Seventh day of #Passover & according to the Jewish tradition, the miracle of parting the Red Sea occurred on this day!
#GoodShabbos #ShabbatShalom & have a wonderful weekend! http://t.co/bF106xLdVy
#Jerusalem Biblical #Zoo attracts more than 750k visitors every year! Don't miss all of the Biblical animals on your next trip to #Israel!
@sjperera To you too!
@RachelHelene Looking forward to it!
@natalie_peer You too, Natalie!
For #Passover, more than 275 lbs of smoked salmon & more than 75,000 sheets of #Matzah will be served on all USA/#Israel #ELAL flights!
#ELAL Haggadah that tells both the story of the Jewish people in Egypt & the story of Operation Solomon. #Passover http://t.co/a6LhWCgq7g
RT @weizma: @ELALUSA Chag Samech to all the staff of EL-AL US i wish to see you soon..........
@weizma We hope to see you soon as well! #HappyPassover #ChagSameach
@BukharianBoy Happy #Passover to you too!
#ChagSameach and Happy #Passover! Do you have anything special planned? http://t.co/bw4jhMnqU5
#ShabbatShalom! Who out there wishes they were in #Israel right now? http://t.co/LSoYqF0sdG
@YiddishCards Looking forward to it!
@davidsokol Send a request to addressbook@elalusa.com and they should be able to provide that for you :)
Do you know why you can float on the water effortlessly only in the Dead Sea? #Israel #Trivia http://t.co/XYzLx0mb8Y
@Tulips_nc Thanks for the kind words, Rachel! We hope to be able to take you back to #Israel soon :)
@IleanaMDiaz Have a wonderful trip!
@davidsokol If the credit is going to your AA account, you'll need to contact AA... wish we could help!
#ELAL welcomes the President of the United States, @BarackObama to #Israel! http://t.co/Y2txv3LrOH
2 days left! Matmid Spring Savings RT flights from NY (JFK/Newark)! $959+30 pts, taxes & fuel charges included! http://t.co/AF5eA4T1Bz
@RabbiShaul Thank you, Rabbi, you too!
@TShadyIsrael Hi there, it's now back where it was originally, on Rothchild Blvd!
@CVRgodol @Israel Maybe it's time for a trip? :)
@ManyanaAU Thanks for the kind words, we hope to see you again soon!
@Isrl4Evr Thank you :)

@Tali1 Business class is open to any age!
